course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Macroeconomic Reaction to Covid-19
course.description: The course will highlight the impact of the Coronavirus (Covid-19) on the global economy and will look at the financial market developments not only from fundamental perspective but also the technical perspective. Bloomberg charts will be used to discuss historical and present market trends and the course will finish by discussing the macroeconomic future as the virus passes. Upon the completion of the course, students will be able to understand how markets react to a crisis with comparison to previous crisis which created a similar demand shock.
